    DagvergunningFragmentPagerAdapter
    Fragment pager adapter for the add/edit dagvergunning wizard - Important: Changed this from the initial FragmentStatePagerAdapter to the FragmentPagerAdapter because the State version gives problems when you are keeping the state of the fragments yourself - Important: The pager always (re)creates the fragment on the next position.
